While in his [[Version 1|one-tailed form]], Naruto knocks the opponent to the ground then throws them into the air and follows up by jumping into the air and slashing them. He then lands and repeats the process several times before finally slashing through them.

[[es:Combo Rápido del Zorro de las Nueve Colas]]
